post.summary: Creates a new app.
post.description:
$ curl {WEAVY_SERVER}/api/apps
-H "Authorization: Bearer {ACCESS_TOKEN | WEAVY_APIKEY}"
-H "Content-Type: application/json"
-d "{ 'uid': 'chat-project-x', 'type': 'chat', 'name': 'Chat for Project X' }"

post.summary: Initialize an app (get existing or create new) and ensure user is member (if specified).
post.description:
$ curl {WEAVY_SERVER}/api/apps/init
-H "Authorization: Bearer {ACCESS_TOKEN | WEAVY_APIKEY}"
-H "Content-Type: application/json"
-d "{'app': { 'uid': 'chat-project-x', 'type': 'chat', 'name': 'Chat for Project X' }, 'user': { 'uid': 'user-1' } }"

patch.description:
$ curl -X PATCH {WEAVY_SERVER}/api/apps/2
-H "Authorization: Bearer {ACCESS_TOKEN | WEAVY_APIKEY}"
-H "Content-Type: application/json"
-d "{'app': { 'uid': 'chat-project-x', 'type': 'chat', 'name': 'Chat for Project X' }, 'user': { 'uid': 'user-1' } }"

post.summary: Subscribe to notifications for activity in an app.
Unsubscribe to notifications for activity in an app.
Move an app to the trash.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Id of the app to trash.

post.summary: Restore an app from the trash.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Id of the app to restore.

get.summary: List the members of an app.

post.summary: Add multiple app members.

get.summary: Get the metadata of a blob.

post.summary:
Uploads a blob using multipart/form-data.
After upload the blob can be used as reference when creating attachments and/or files.

Creates a cloud blob, i.e. a blob that links to an external blob provider.
After creation the blob can be used as reference when creating attachments and/or files.
Creates a new comment in the specified Comments app.
post.description:
$ curl {WEAVY_SERVER}/api/apps/1/comments
-H "Authorization: Bearer {ACCESS_TOKEN | WEAVY_APIKEY}"
-H "Content-Type: application/json"
-d "{ 'text': 'This is a comment' }"

get.summary: List comments in the specified Comments app.

post.summary: Creates a new comment on the specified file.
post.description:
$ curl {WEAVY_SERVER}/api/files/1/comments
-H "Authorization: Bearer {ACCESS_TOKEN | WEAVY_APIKEY}"
-H "Content-Type: application/json"
-d "{ 'text': 'This is a comment on a file' }"

get.summary: List comments on the specified file.

post.summary: Creates a new comment on the specified post.
post.description:
$ curl {WEAVY_SERVER}/api/posts/1/comments
-H "Authorization: Bearer {ACCESS_TOKEN | WEAVY_APIKEY}"
-H "Content-Type: application/json"
-d "{ 'text': 'This is a comment on a post' }"

get.summary: List comments on the specified post.

patch.description:
$ curl -X PATCH {WEAVY_SERVER}/api/comments/1
-H "Authorization: Bearer {ACCESS_TOKEN | WEAVY_APIKEY}"
-H "Content-Type: application/json"
-d "{'text': 'Update comment text' }"

post.summary: Move a comment to the trash.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Id of the comment to trash.

post.summary: Restore a comment from the trash.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Id of the comment to restore.

put.summary: Indicate that the authenticated user is commenting on a file.
Indicate that the authenticated user is commenting on a post.

post.summary:
Create a chat room or private chat. If member count is more than one, a chat room is created.
If name is omitted, the name of the chat will be the participant(s) names.
post.description:
$ curl {WEAVY_SERVER}/api/conversations
-H "Authorization: Bearer {ACCESS_TOKEN}"
-H "Content-Type: application/json"
-d "{ 'name': 'My chat room', 'members': [1, 4, 14] }"
            
$ curl {WEAVY_SERVER}/api/conversations
-H "Authorization: Bearer {ACCESS_TOKEN}"
-H "Content-Type: application/json"
-d "{ 'name': 'My private chat', 'members': [ 4 ] }"

get.summary: List the conversations for the authenticated user.
Get number of unread conversations for the authenticated user (grouped by conversation type).
List the members of a directory.

post.summary: Create an embed for the given url.

requestBody.description: Contains the URL to retrieve embedding information for.

post.summary: Creates a new file in the specified Files app.

get.summary: List files in the specified Files app.

parameters.name: trashed
parameters.description: `true` to return file even if trashed.

patch.description:
$ curl -X PATCH {WEAVY_SERVER}/api/files/1
-H "Authorization: Bearer {ACCESS_TOKEN | WEAVY_APIKEY}"
-H "Content-Type: application/json"
-d "{ 'name': 'Updated file name' }"

get.summary: Get specific version of a file.

delete.summary: Delete specific version of a file.

get.summary: Get versions for the specified file.

post.summary: Subscribe to notifications for activity on a file.
Unsubscribe to notifications for activity on a file.
Move a file to the trash.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Id of the file to trash.

post.summary: Restore a file from the trash.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Id of the file to restore.

post.summary:
Restore a previous version of a file to be the current version.
This will create a new version with the contents of the previous version, but preserves all existing versions of the file.

get.summary: List files attached to the specified comment.
List files attached to the specified message.
List files attached to the specified post.

post.summary: Create a meeting. The provider can either be 'zoom' or 'teams'.
Creates a new message in the specified Conversation (Chat, ChatRoom or PrivateChat).
post.description:
$ curl {WEAVY_SERVER}/api/apps/1/messages
-H "Authorization: Bearer {ACCESS_TOKEN | WEAVY_APIKEY}"
-H "Content-Type: application/json"
-d "{ 'text': 'This is a message' }"

get.summary: List messages in the specified Conversation (Chat, ChatRoom or PrivateChat).

patch.description:
$ curl -X PATCH {WEAVY_SERVER}/api/messages/1
-H "Authorization: Bearer {ACCESS_TOKEN | WEAVY_APIKEY}"
-H "Content-Type: application/json"
-d "{ 'text': 'This is an updated message' }"

post.summary: Move a message to the trash.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Id of the message to trash.

post.summary: Restore a message from the trash.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Id of the message to restore.

put.summary: Indicate that the authenticated user is typing a message.

put.description:
$ curl -X PUT {WEAVY_SERVER}/api/notifications/mark
-H "Authorization: Bearer {ACCESS_TOKEN}"
            
$ curl -X PUT {WEAVY_SERVER}/api/notifications/mark?id=3
-H "Authorization: Bearer {ACCESS_TOKEN}"

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Optional id of last seen notification. When specified, this and previous notifications are marked as read, otherwise all notifications (uncluding yet unseen) are marked as read.

post.summary: Vote for a poll option.

get.summary: List users that voted for the specified option.

post.summary: Creates a new post in the specified Posts app.

$ curl {WEAVY_SERVER}/api/apps/1/posts
-H "Authorization: Bearer {ACCESS_TOKEN | WEAVY_APIKEY}"
-H "Content-Type: application/json"
-d "{ 'text': 'This is a post' }"

get.summary: List posts in the specified Posts app.

patch.description:
$ curl -X PATCH {WEAVY_SERVER}/api/posts/1
-H "Authorization: Bearer {ACCESS_TOKEN | WEAVY_APIKEY}"
-H "Content-Type: application/json"
-d "{ 'text': 'This is an updated post' }"

get.summary: List users based on autocomplete search.

parameters.name: top
parameters.description: Max number of items to return.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Optional app id. When set, the result contains a property indicating wheter the user is a member of the specified app or not.

post.summary: Issue an access token for the specified user. Creates the user if it does not exists.

delete.summary: Revoke all access tokens for the specified user.

parameters.name: id

tags.name: Apps
tags.description: The Apps API enables you to manage apps.

tags.name: Blobs
tags.description: The Blobs API enables the creation and listing of blobs.

tags.name: Comments
tags.description: The Comments API supports managing comments.

tags.name: Conversations
tags.description: The Conversations API has methods for creating, and managing converations.

tags.name: Embeds
tags.description: The Embeds API converts URLs into embedded videos, images and rich article previews.

tags.name: Files
tags.description: The Files API has methods for managing files.

tags.name: Meetings
tags.description: The Meetings API enabled you to create meetings (which can later be attached to messages).

tags.name: Messages
tags.description: The Messages API supports managing chat messages.

tags.name: Notifications
tags.description: The Notifications API has methods for managing notifications.

tags.name: Options
tags.description: The Options API supports managing poll options.

tags.name: Posts
tags.description: The Comments API supports managing posts.

tags.name: Reactions
tags.description: The Reactions API enables you to create, list and delete reactions.

tags.name: Stars
tags.description: The Stars API enables bookmarking things for reference and/or follow-up.

tags.name: Users
tags.description: The Users API has methods for managing users.

tags.name: Webhooks
tags.description:
The Webhooks API enable you to register and manage webhooks.
You can also use the API to list webhook deliveries for a webhook.
